title: What if I just bought RP recently?
body:
http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/extra-bonus-rp-headed-your-way-limited-time

Will this bonus work the same as skin sales to the point where if you just bought a skin and it goes on sale you get the discount even if you bought it before the sale. Just because you only bought it say a week before.

Will the same policy apply to the RP purchase bonuses if I only bought a few days ago?

Thanks

replies.body: Nope I'm 90% sure it doesn't work that way for the RP purchases (this is just from my personal experience from S2 till now)
this is riots way for getting more money, if you look, the prices for discounts are higher than they currently are
